issue.title: Transitive dependency on protobuf in gazebo's pkg-config file

content.raw: That's a good point. We include protobuf in the cmake config file (see [here](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/b3120151fa9ab3712f5c8d3883f2da4f9cf35efa/CMakeLists.txt?at=default#cl-341) and [here](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/b3120151fa9ab3712f5c8d3883f2da4f9cf35efa/cmake/gazebo-config.cmake.in?at=default#cl-27)), but not the [pkgconfig file](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/b3120151fa9ab3712f5c8d3883f2da4f9cf35efa/cmake/pkgconfig/gazebo.in?at=default#cl-9).
content.html: That's a good point. We include protobuf in the cmake config file (see here and here), but not the pkgconfig file.

issue.title: Transitive dependency on protobuf in gazebo's pkg-config file

content.raw:
@NikolausDemmel could you try please, adding protobuf in the "Requires:" field of the pkgconfig file you are using?

```
Requires: protobuf
```

Let me know if that fix the issue for you.
content.html:
@NikolausDemmel could you try please, adding protobuf in the "Requires:" field of the pkgconfig file you are using?

Requires: protobuf

Let me know if that fix the issue for you.

issue.title: Transitive dependency on protobuf in gazebo's pkg-config file

content.raw:
I could broaden this issue to say that no transitive dependencies are included in the gazebo pkg-config file. For example, some of the example plugins are failing to build on mac since pkg-config is used and the boost headers aren't included ([test failures](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-homebrew-amd64/85/testReport/)):
~~~
195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/0, where GetParam() = "animate_joints"
195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/1, where GetParam() = "animate_pose"
~~~
Detailed build errors:
~~~

content.html:
I could broaden this issue to say that no transitive dependencies are included in the gazebo pkg-config file. For example, some of the example plugins are failing to build on mac since pkg-config is used and the boost headers aren't included (test failures):

195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/1, where GetParam() = "animate_pose"

issue.title: Transitive dependency on protobuf in gazebo's pkg-config file

content.raw: @_jrivero_ : adding `Requires: protobuf` works for my specific case, but @scpeters has pointed out that likely other dependencies need to be added.
content.html: @jrivero : adding Requires: protobuf works for my specific case, but @scpeters has pointed out that likely other dependencies need to be added.

issue.title: Transitive dependency on protobuf in gazebo's pkg-config file

content.raw: P.S.: A backport to 1.9 would be great for any fix of this issue.
content.html: P.S.: A backport to 1.9 would be great for any fix of this issue.

issue.title: Transitive dependency on protobuf in gazebo's pkg-config file

content.raw: I believe this is fixed as of gazebo5
content.html: I believe this is fixed as of gazebo5
